rules.name: Remove EAR and WebLogic-specific modules
rules.description: Identify and remove EAR modules, which are not required or compatible in Apache TomEE server (use WAR packaging instead)

rules.name: Remove WebLogic Quartz dependency
rules.description: Remove WebLogic-specific Quartz artifact and use the standard Quartz library for TomEE

rules.name: Remove WebLogic Coherence dependency
rules.description: Remove Oracle Coherence libraries (WebLogicâ€™s caching/grid) and associated code, since TomEE does not include Coherence

rules.name: Remove Oracle JDBC driver dependency
rules.description: Remove or replace the Oracle JDBC (ojdbc) driver dependency if not needed (for example, when migrating the database or using a different data source in TomEE)
